title.rendered: People’s Viennaline Airlines in Vienna, Austria

content.rendered:
People’s, branded as People’s Viennaline until May 2018, and legally Altenrhein Luftfahrt GmbH, is an Austrian airline headquartered in Vienna. It operates scheduled and charter passenger flights mainly from its base at St. Gallen-Altenrhein Airport in Switzerland.

Founded as People’s Viennaline in 2010, the first revenue flight of the company took place on 27 March 2011. For several years, People’s only operated a single scheduled route between its homebase and Vienna. However, the route network has since been expanded with some seasonal and charter services.

People’s Viennaline Airlines Address, Phone, Email, Working hours

Address: Office Park 3 / Top 312
A-1300 Vienna Airport

Branch office Switzerland

Address: Flughafenstrasse 11
CH-9423 Altenrhein

Contact for bookings, rebookings, cancellations etc

Phone: +43 5572 203 610 from Austria
Phone: +41 71 858 51 60 from Switzerland, Liechtenstein and Germany

Email: info@peoples.ch

Opening hours:
Monday to Friday: 11 a.m. to 3:30 p.m.
Saturday & Sunday: closed

People’s Viennaline Airlines Official website: https://peoples.ch/peoples-airline/

People’s Viennaline Airlines Online Check-in: https://peoples.ch/peoples-airline/fluggast-informationen/check-in

Note: Check-in counter opens 90 minutes before departure.

Check People’s Viennaline Airlines schedule here: https://peoples.ch/peoples-airline/flugplan-peoples

Check People’s Viennaline Airlines flight status here: https://peoples.ch/airport-st-gallen-altenrhein/flugstatus-st-gallen

People’s Viennaline Airlines Baggage Allowance

View People’s Viennaline Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Types of Planes / Air craft available with People’s Viennaline Airlines 

  • Embraer 170

Queries handled by People’s Viennaline Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the People’s Viennaline Airlines Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the People’s Viennaline Airlines : (click on the stars below)
